Sam's already been wedgied, stripped, kicked in the nuts, and pantsed in a prank.

What else could go wrong you might ask? These choices are a bit more, a'hem, graphic. Every little detail about his boyhood and what happens should be recalled with amazing accuracy.

Sam should be slightly older in these, but not required. These choices are not for the faint of heart.
15.title: Other choices

info.brief_description: Sam gets embarrassed, wedgied, stripped and humiliated for having a tiny dick.
info.description:
Wedgies, pantsing, bring stripped, kicked in the nuts, and otherwise used, abused, and humiliated. Sam faces it all due the size of his tiny 🍆😈 😂 🤣

Anything goes in this life sized, all too relatable storyline featuring Sam, a boy whose privates are put on display for the world to see, much to his dismay. Every type of fetish can be represented, with different chapters either adding, changing, or combining the fetishes in the story. He may range in age from story to story, as situations vary widely. He should be kept in the range of 12-20, to maximize his humiliation.

Writer beware, short chapters are for newbies, and I'll delete gross grammatical errors and vague, repetitive, or simplistic stories. Don't worry. If I do delete your content, though, I'll replace it with the same fetish you wrote about. So do your best, or I will do it better 😈
